title: REMOVE_MP_GAMER_TAG
content:
0x31698AA80E0223F80x3D081FE4// RemoveMpGamerTag
void REMOVE_MP_GAMER_TAG(int gamerTagId);Parameters:gamerTagId: A player ID with a gamer tag or a fake gamer tag ID.Removes the gamer tag associated with the provided ID. This does not happen instantly. Use IS_MP_GAMER_TAG_FREE to determine when the ID is free for reuse.
